title: Cart-Item Pricing
description: A price representation within the wunderbon domain. This structure describes the price of an item. This includes gross and net price as well as tax (VAT = Value Added Tax).

net.description: Price EXCLUDING tax (e.g. VAT = Value Added Tax or others).

gross.description: Price INCLUDING tax (e.g. VAT = Value Added Tax or others).

tax.description: Taxes applied on this item (e.g. VAT = Value Added Tax or others).
